function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient data on the effectiveness of botanical air filtration under realistic ventilation conditions","Impact":"Limited understanding of the true removal mechanisms of botanical air filtration systems, potentially leading to ineffective air purification","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and experimentation under realistic ventilation conditions to understand the true removal mechanisms and effectiveness of botanical air filtration","Technologies":"Advanced air quality monitoring and testing technologies, simulation models for indoor air flow and purification","People":"Researchers, air quality experts, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, air quality organizations"},{"Description":"Overestimation of indoor plant air purification capabilities based on chamber studies","Impact":"Misleading perception of indoor plant air purification effectiveness, leading to inadequate air quality improvement measures","Mitigation":"Conduct studies and experiments with realistic plant-to-air volume ratios to accurately assess indoor plant air purification capabilities","Technologies":"Monitoring equipment for VOC levels, indoor air flow simulation models","People":"Researchers, air quality experts, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, air quality organizations"},{"Description":"Potential microbial growth related to VOCs becoming a carbon source for soil microbial communities in plant rhizosphere","Impact":"Increased risk of microbial contamination in indoor environments, leading to potential health hazards","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and air purification measures to control microbial growth, conduct regular monitoring of indoor microbial communities","Technologies":"Microbial detection and monitoring technologies, advanced ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Building managers, indoor air quality experts","Owner":"Building management organizations"}]}
